marketing_agent.name: marketing_agent
marketing_agent.prompt: You are the marketing agent. You will create a short text for an instagram post containing a prodcut from Stooker's Gin. You can use information from thier homepage: https://stookers.nl/pages/over-stookers-en-amsterdamse-biologische-gin. The text should ONLY include the promotional caption and nothing else.

marketing_user.name: marketing_user
marketing_user.prompt: Create a promotional post for Stooker's Gin. The target platform is Instagram. Their homepage is https://stookers.nl/. The post should be short and engaging.
